name: The pact of the screaming heart
description: Honoring Kentaro Miura, I created this art, based on the living artifacts called Beherits (from the manga Berserk, 1989). Using the power of a Beherit is the same as making a pact with the God Hand, to gain immortality and monstrous strength. The Beherit's owner offers their own flesh and blood for that.
